Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Hello dear video creators!
We’ve been polishing the app for a while, tracing, catching and fixing some nasty bugs, but most importantly - working on something very, very lovely. Meet our new juicy icon! Such a pretty girl, isn’t she?! She’s our personal favourite from now on, this little peach.

Hello dear video creators!
We’ve been polishing the app for a while, tracing, catching and fixing some nasty bugs, but most importantly - working on something very, very lovely. Meet our new juicy icon! Such a pretty girl, isn’t she?! She’s our personal favourite from now on, this little peach.

Hello lovely creators!
We have a Christmas present for you! This year, we're taking VideoTrim to a whole new level - with the ability to use photos, add multiple soundtracks and sound effects, and better support your trimming and cutting operations with a brand new timeline!
Don't forget to leave a review to tell us how you like it.
Merry Christmas and a very happy New Year,
The VideoTrim team

Hello lovely creators!
We have a Christmas present for you! This year, we're taking VideoTrim to a whole new level - with the ability to use photos, add multiple soundtracks and sound effects, and better support your trimming and cutting operations with a brand new timeline!
Don't forget to leave a review to tell us how you like it.
Merry Christmas and a very happy New Year,
The VideoTrim team
